intro: Nylandtia spinosa, commonly known as the spiny nylandtia, is a flowering plant native to parts of Africa. It belongs to the family Rubiaceae, which includes many shrubs and trees. The plant is characterized by its spiny stems and opposite, ovate leaves with serrated edges. It produces small, white or pinkish flowers that are clustered in inflorescences. The fruits are small, capsule-like structures that release tiny seeds when mature.
